items.title: AI-Powered Product Recommendation Engine
items.description: Implement an AI-based system to provide personalized product recommendations to users based on browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System generates at least 5 relevant product recommendations for each user session
Recommendations update dynamically based on user interactions within the same session
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing compared to baseline
Recommendations are displayed within 2 seconds of page load
dependencies: User profile and purchase history data
non_functional: Response time under 2 seconds for recommendation generation
Scalable to handle 1 million concurrent users

notes: Assumed that the platform already has user accounts, product catalog, and tracking of browsing/purchase history. No details provided on specific AI model or integration points.
